thread.section_title: Santa Clarita, CA Local News and More | NewsBreak

author: NewsBreak Original
text:
By Dani Gallegos ,
3 hours ago
Sierra Vista Junior High is gearing up for a Holiday Gift Drive and asking for donations this holiday season. This Holiday season, Sierra Vista Junior High School in Canyon Country is hosting a Holiday Gift Drive to support students and families in need within the community.
This effort is part of our commitment to ensuring every student feels the joy of the season,” said officials with Sierra Vista Junior High School.
Sierra Vista Junior High School has created an Amazon Wish List to make it simple for donors to contribute and are accepting donations from now until Friday, Dec. 13.
For more information, contact Amanda Markovich at (661) 252-3113 x2201 or amarkovich@hartdistrict.org .
